explanation: The report is correct. MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.8 forbids modifying function parameters (scalar value parameters) after entry. In lfs_bd_read the scalar parameters off and size are assigned to (e.g. off += diff; size -= diff;) inside the function. These are direct modifications of value parameters, so they violate Rule 17.8. (The rule’s note allowing modification of the object referred to by a pointer does not apply here because off and size are not pointers.) A simple remediation is to copy the parameters into local variables (for example lfs_off_t cur_off = off; lfs_size_t rem = size;) and modify those locals instead.
